question: International Mountain Day is observed on which date?
explanation: International Mountain Day is observed on 11 December. The day aims to raise awareness about conserving the mountains. A report says that 15% of the world\'s population lives in the mountains. It is necessary to conserve the mountains. Mountain conservation is a crucial factor for sustainable development Goal 15 (SDG-15).Â  The theme of the 2019 International Mountain Day is Mountains Matter for Youth.
